displayName: Ensure that 'Send email notification for high severity alerts' is set to 'On'
rationale: Enabling security alert emails ensures that security alert emails are received from Microsoft. This ensures that the right people are aware of any potential security issues and are able to mitigate the risk.
recommended_action:
1. Go to Security Center
2. Click on Security Policy
3. Click On Edit Settings for the security policy subscriptionn4. Click on Email notifications
5. Set Send email notification for high severity alerts to On
6. Click Save.
error_message: Security center's setting to send email notifications is not enabled
ruleNames: Ensure that sending emails for high severity setting is set to on
